class.name: TextLine
class.description: Abstraction over [TextServer] for handling a single line of text.

method.name: add_object
method.description: Adds inline object to the text buffer, [param key] must be unique. In the text, object is represented as [param length] object replacement characters.

method.name: add_string
method.description: Adds text span and font to draw it.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears text line (removes text and inline objects).

method.name: draw
method.description: Draw text into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: draw_outline
method.description: Draw text into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: get_line_ascent
method.description: Returns the text ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical).

method.name: get_line_descent
method.description: Returns the text descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical).

method.name: get_line_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: get_line_width
method.description: Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the text.

method.name: get_object_rect
method.description: Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns size of the bounding box of the text.

method.name: hit_test
method.description: Returns caret character offset at the specified pixel offset at the baseline. This function always returns a valid position.

method.name: resize_object
method.description: Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

method.name: set_bidi_override
method.description: Overrides BiDi for the structured text. Override ranges should cover full source text without overlaps. BiDi algorithm will be used on each range separately.

method.name: tab_align
method.description: Aligns text to the given tab-stops.
